sql.sql: SELECT id, type_code, code, name_en, name_ru, name_combined, color_code, allow_edit, allow_delete FROM process_state ORDER BY type_code, code

script.py:
from apng_core.db import fetchall

SQL = """
    SELECT id, type_code, code, name_en, name_ru, name_combined,
           color_code, allow_edit, allow_delete
    FROM process_state
    WHERE 1=1
"""

params = {}

if parameters.get('type_code'):
    SQL += " AND type_code = :type_code"
    params['type_code'] = parameters['type_code']

if parameters.get('code'):
    SQL += " AND UPPER(code) LIKE UPPER(:code)"
    params['code'] = f"%{parameters['code']}%"

if parameters.get('name'):
    SQL += " AND (UPPER(name_en) LIKE UPPER(:name) OR UPPER(name_ru) LIKE UPPER(:name) OR UPPER(name_combined) LIKE UPPER(:name))"
    params['name'] = f"%{parameters['name']}%"

SQL += " ORDER BY type_code, code"

with initDbSession(database='default').cursor() as c:
    c.execute(SQL, params)
    data = fetchall(c)

select
  T_VAL.CODE VAL_CODE,       -- валюта
  G_ACCBLN.CODE ACC_CODE,    -- корсчетунас
  G_BNK.CODE BANK,        -- корреспонденткодбанка
  substr(g_pkgBnk.fGetLongNameBnk_Id(G_BNK.ID),1,250) BANK_NAME
 from 
  T_PROCESS, T_PROCMEM, T_BOP_STAT, T_DEA, T_DEACLS,
  G_ACCBLN, G_BNK, P_ACCDSC, T_VAL, 
  P_BNKACC, I_BNKREL, I_DEAREL
where
  I_DEAREL.COR_ID = I_BNKREL.ID
  and I_BNKREL.ID = P_BNKACC.ID
  and P_BNKACC.DEP_ID = G_ACCBLN.DEP_ID (+)
  and P_BNKACC.LINK_ID = G_ACCBLN.ID (+)
  and P_ACCDSC.ID = P_BNKACC.ACC_ID
  and T_VAL.ID = P_BNKACC.VAL_ID
  and I_BNKREL.CLI_ID = G_BNK.ID
  and I_BNKREL.DEP_ID = T_PROCMEM.DEP_ID and I_BNKREL.ORD_ID = T_PROCMEM.ORD_ID
  and T_PROCMEM.MAINFL = '1'
  and T_PROCESS.ID = T_PROCMEM.ID
  and T_PROCESS.BOP_ID = T_BOP_STAT.ID and T_PROCESS.NSTAT = T_BOP_STAT.NORD
  and I_BNKREL.DEP_ID = T_DEA.DEP_ID and I_BNKREL.ORD_ID = T_DEA.ID
  and T_DEA.DCL_ID = T_DEACLS.ID
